isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - BRAKE SWITCH CIRCUITS (BRAKE) - BEFORE TROUBLESHOOTING

svcproc.title: BEFORE TROUBLESHOOTING
svcproc.para: Before troubleshooting, make sure the batteries are fully charged.
Check battery cables and grounds for clean and tight connections free of damage. Voltage readings will not be accurate if the batteries are not fully charged.

Inspect circuit connectors for pushed back, loose or damaged (spread or bent) terminals, or wires with cut strands etc. Wires and connections must be free of damage or corrosion. When some connectors corrode, a light white residue will be present that must be removed.
Inspect the suspect circuit ground for clean, tight connections free of damage.
